ovdesc.p: This table is used to produce XML schema from a DDL (Data Definition Language)
This a "W" type template. After speciying the DDL, we need to verify the template for producing the xml schema.

desc.p: This field contains the key of the template.
The @ID will act as a table name for External DataWarehouse table.
This field contains the External DataWarehouse table type.
Possible values FACT , DIMENSION or null
1. If the field is null, it is understood as DIMENSION table.
This field contains a short description of the record.
2. Length: Maximum of 35 and min of 3
TEXT box which stores the DDL for which we need to produce the XML schema.
2. For now we start with accepting DDL for Create table alone.
NOTE: EB.DDL.SCHEMA does not look for the correct syntax of DDL. It is left to the discretion of the user to input the correct DDL.
